    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(int id,
              String name,
              int unplaced_armies,
              int score,
              Color playercolor,
              ArrayList<Card> playercards)
        Parameters:
        id - number used to identify the player
        name - the name of the player
        unplaced_armies - the amount of armies that the player can still place of the board
        score - the current score of the player
        playercolor - the colour the the player has currently chosen
        playercards - the cards that the player currently has
